abstract: Sovereign wealth funds based in Asia and the Middle East are on the move. In recent months, these huge government-backed investment firms have taken stakes in Bear Stearns, the Carlyle Group, Advanced Micro Devices, and perhaps most notably, Citigroup.
lead_paragraph: Sovereign wealth funds based in Asia and the Middle East are on the move. In recent months, these huge government-backed investment firms have taken stakes in Bear Stearns, the Carlyle Group, Advanced Micro Devices, and perhaps most notably, Citigroup.

headline.main: A How-To Guide for Sovereign Wealth Funds
